{{disambig}}
'''Spore''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
=== Blocks ===
*{{BlockLink|Spore Blossom}}, a large, flat flower spawning in the ceiling of [[lush caves]].

=== Particles ===
*<code>spore_blossom_air</code>, emitted by spore blossoms.

== ''Minecraft Dungeons'' ==
*{{DuEffectLink|Spore Blossom}}, a healing flair.
*{{DuEffectLink|Spore Pop}}, a level-up flair.

== ''Minecraft Legends'' ==
=== Mobs and entities ===
*{{LeEntityLink|Spore Medic}}, a small piglin that utilizes spore gas to heal piglins and harm other creatures.
*{{LeEntityLink|Sporeback}}, a ranged piglin affiliated with the {{MCL|Horde of the Spore}} that throws warped fungi as a means of attack.

=== Structures ===
*{{LeStructureLink|Spore Tower}}, a tree-like piglin structure whose foliage occasionally slams down to cause knockback and damage.

=== Other ===
*{{LeStructureLink|Horde of the Spore}}, one of the three {{MCL|piglin horde}}s.
